review: I absolutely love this device.  I've had a Logitech Revue for a couple years and didn't think it could get better than that.  The Revue started acting up and so my brother bought this for me as a Birthday gift and I, almost, couldn't be happier.  The one con I have with this device as I do with other similar products is there is no HDMI pass-through (which was suppose to be the HDMI standard but that's off topic).  On the bright side, my Sony TV is able to detect when the device powers up and switches video modes for me, I just have to switch back manually.  A minor inconvenience.I guess the only other issue I have is the size of the power plug.  It is bulky and basically forced me to unplug two devices on my powerstrip.  Again, a minor inconvenience.  The amount of entertainment I'm getting out of this device far exceeds any minor flaws I've found.  I believe it is all solid state as well.  I could be mistaken.  It extremely quiet, no fans, doesn't put off any heat I can detect and it goes to sleep when not in use.I've used it for Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Vudu.  Works perfectly with them all!  I highly recommend this device!
